message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I'm offering it to you for $140. This price reflects the high demand and limited supply of the item. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $130 for it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet my asking price. To further discuss this opportunity, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the value of the item and the benefits it provides. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $132 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I've considered your proposal and I think we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to suggest a price of $133 for the product. This price takes into account the value of the item while also allowing for some flexibility in our negotiations. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $131 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. Considering the value and the discussions we've had, I would like to propose a price of $132 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests. I look forward to your response.
